  • News Explorer Is a Pretty Great Feed Reader

    I am currently using News Explorer for reading feeds. There are clients for both iOS and Mac, and they are improving all the time. What I like most about it is that it syncs over iCloud rather than via some third party service. It works really well, and I don’t have to depend on some service to continue existing forever. I keep the data in my own little iCloud silo.

     04 February 2018

  • Might Lifetime Subscriptions Be the Answer to Subscription Fatigue?

    I’m considering the idea of adding a lifetime subscription option to LinkLocker. I think “subscription fatigue” is a very real phenomenon, and I personally understand where that feeling is coming from. I think I can set a price for lifetime access that will work from a business perspective, and I’m seriously considering this. I’m curious about what users of online services might think about such a model.
